1:
Yahweh, how many are my enemies!
\q Many have risen against me.
\q
2:
Many say about me,
\q "There is no help for him from God."
\qs Selah\qs*
3:
But you, Yahweh, are a shield around me,
\q my glory, and the one who lifts up my head.
\q
4:
I lift up my voice to Yahweh,
\q and he answers me from his holy hill.
\qs Selah\qs*
6:
I will not be afraid of the multitudes of people
\q who have set themselves against me on every side.
7:
Rise up, Yahweh! Save me, my God!
\q For you will hit all my enemies on the jaw;
\q you will break the teeth of the wicked.
\q
8:
Salvation comes from Yahweh.
\q May your blessings be on your people.
\qs Selah\qs*
